EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1338826077.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Darren, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Steve Arhancet. I wanted to introduce myself and follow up on my voicemail. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Steve has brought me up to speed on your background and I know you have have a contract you are plannig to run through MBO. Please provide me with your client’s contacat information (name, email, phone) and I will reach out to them. Please feel free to email or call me directly. Yo may also schedule a phone appoiment if you prefer by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to workign with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
